Interface ThemeApplyer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface ThemeApplyer
    Represents a theme generator (inventory creation).

    • Method Detail

      • getInventorySize

        int getInventorySize()
        Gets the of the inventory view to generate.

        Recommended: 6*9

        Returns:
        Returns the inventory size.

      • shouldBePlaced

        boolean shouldBePlaced(InterfaceElements object,
                       APlayer targetPlayer)
        Checks whenever a given element has to be shown to a player.
        Parameters:
        object - The element to check for.
        targetPlayer - The targeted player.
        Returns:
        Returns 'true' if the element should be put in the view, 'false' otherwise.

      • getPositionInInventory

        int getPositionInInventory(InterfaceElements object,
                           int inventorySize,
                           APlayer targetPlayer)
        Gets the position in the inventory view where the given element should be placed.
        Parameters:
        object - The element to place.
        inventorySize - The size of the inventory.
        targetPlayer - The player being targeted.
        Returns:
        Returns the position of the given element or -1 if it should not be placed.

      • getItem

        AnItem getItem(InterfaceElements position,
               APlayer targetPlayer,
               ITranslator translator)
        Gets the item stack to show to a player for a given element.
        Parameters:
        position - The element being rendered.
        targetPlayer - The targeted player.
        translator - The I18n interface to handle translations.
        Returns:
        Returns the wrapped item stack to display.

      • drawCode

        void drawCode(AnInventory inventory,
              InterfaceElements[] values,
              APlayer targetPlayer,
              ITranslator translator)
        Draw the code (succession of digits) in the view.

        The actual Digits are already converted to InterfaceElements.

        Parameters:
        inventory - The inventory where the code should be displayed.
        values - The elements composing the code.
        targetPlayer - The targeted player.
        translator - The I18n interface to handle translations.

      • interfaceCreationFailure

        void interfaceCreationFailure(AnInventory inventory,
                              APlayer targetPlayer,
                              ITranslator translator)
        This method is called when an error occur during the interface creation.
        Parameters:
        inventory - The actual state of the inventory being created.
        targetPlayer - The targeted player.
        translator - The I18n interface to handle translations.
